tool_description: Retrieve current, forecasted, and historical air quality for any point in the world.
name: Air Quality
title: Air Quality

api_list.name: Air Quality History
api_list.description: Returns the past 24 hours of air quality observations for any point in the world given a lat/lon.

api_list.name: Air Quality Forecast
api_list.description: Returns a 3 day (72 hour) air quality forecast for any point in the world given a lat/lon.

api_list.name: Current Air Quality
api_list.description: Retrieves current air quality conditions for any location in the world, given a lat/lon.
